title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Know your Government
body: Know your Government       Would you like to learn more about the United States government? How about learning more about each president? Visit Kids.gov and explore. You can learn even more about your government by visiting Ben's Guide for Kids. Visit the United States Mint to learn more about our money. Learn about the "Charters of Freedom" The United States Constitution:  "We the People of the United States, in Order to form a more perfect Union..." The Declaration of Independence: "When in the Course of human events..." Bill of Rights: "Congress of the United States, begun and held at the City of New-York..."
